info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 6:53PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Schenectady, northeastern Albany, southeastern Saratoga and northwestern Rensselaer Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 653 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Voorheesville, or near Colonie, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on raodways. Locations impacted include... Albany, Schenectady, Troy, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, Cohoes, Watervliet, Colonie, Mechanicville, Latham, Delmar, Guilderland, Niskayuna, Menands, Voorheesville, Green Island, Waterford, Altamont, Loudonville and Center Brunswick. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 6A and 25. Interstate 890 between exits 6 and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 23 and 7, and between exits 8A and 10. Interstate 787 between exits 5 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
